actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution to constitute the majority party's membership on the Governmental Affairs committee for the 105th Congress, or until their successors are chosen.

summary.text: Designates Senators Fred Thompson (Chair), Susan Collins, Sam Brownback, Pete V. Domenici, Thad Cochran, Don Nickles, Arlen Specter, Bob Smith, and Robert S. Bennett as the majority party's membership on the Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs for the 105th Congress.

titles.title: A resolution to constitute the majority party's membership on the Governmental Affairs committee for the 105th Congress, or until their successors are chosen.
